label: Realtime
description: The Real Time data service is a RESTful web service which provides the latest reading for the specified site or time series identifier in XML or JSON format

arguments.label: Sites
arguments.name: sites
arguments.description: Comma separated site names. Either this or the Timeseries argument is required

arguments.label: Timeseries
arguments.name: timeseries
arguments.description: Comma separated time series names. Either this or the Sites argument is required
